name: Postivi DEMO
description:
-----

Postivi is a adventure art game. You will play as Unnamed, his main goal is to get out of the country Ivi. You will have to solve puzzles, talk, walk and deliver mail.

WATCH THIS VIDEO IF YOU'RE STUCK

Features:

  • Unique art style
  • Humor XD
  • Weirdness
  • Delivering mail
  • Walking
  • Talking
  • Some horror elements
  • Русский перевод в будущем ;)

Controls:

  • Up, left, down and right arrow keys: Move
  • Z: Interact
  • Tab: Open task / letter.
  • F2: Restart the Game
  • F4: Full Screen / Windowed Screen
  • Minus and plus keys: Volume Settings

Credits:

fokifox: Game developement, story writing, drawing, music.
G.A.S: Drawing, ideas, testing.
rsstudios: Testing, ideas.
сельский понос: Ideas, drawing. 
#adventure #puzzle #indie
